args:
When the prince attempts to ally with Crown
Prince Leonidas of Valkaheim, the group learns
that internal discord has broken out in the city.
In order to save a group of Church adherents
that have been driven out of the city, the party
heads for a place called the Forsaken Way.
Now that we're buds with Saint Lotier,\nwe have the supplies to battle anyone!
We got the tools, the time, and the talent,\nso let's march south, launch an assault on\nSol Alberia, and get Zethia back!
Actually, Ranzal, I have a different plan.
I ain't a professional...uh...map guy,\nbut I'm pretty sure that's the opposite\ndirection from where Zethia is.
Do you even WANT to rescue your sister?!
You're right that we might be able to get\nZethia back if we moved out now.
However, we still aren't strong enough to\nsave all of the other people who are\ncurrently being oppressed by the Empire.
This is a fair assessment, but I fail to see\nhow marching north solves the problem.
There are cities in the north.\nTwo large cities, to be specific.
First is the City of Flame, Valkaheim.\nIt's governed by my elder brother,\nCrown Prince Leonidas.
And the second is the Radiant City,\nChanzelia. It's ruled by my sister Chelle.
Neither one has taken a stand either\nfor or against the Empire's recent actions.
But if they agree to stand and fight with us,\nthey would make a powerful pair of allies.
I think securing their help is the best\nway for us to topple the Empire.
Sound like a good pair of folks\nto have watchin' our backs!
Well then, darling? Where to first?
I'd like to start with Valkaheim.
My brother's army is one of the largest\non the continent. If they agree to join us,\nit may convince others to do the same.
Your Majesty, we've just received word\nof a large-scale disturbance in Valkaheim.
A major battle has apparently broken out,\nand a large number of people have been\ndriven from the city.
Do you have any more details?
An unknown person apparently attacked\nthe Ilia cathedral in the town center.\nThere were...many victims.

The survivors have fled to a part of the
border region called the Forsaken Way,
and are now requesting whatever aid
we can provide.
I've never heard of the Forsaken Way.
It is an ancient area—more of a tunnel\nthan anything. People used to use it\nas a kind of shortcut.
However, it was overrun by a lava\nflow at some point and abandoned.
Elly, get me all the information you can\nabout the Forsaken Way. Everyone else,\nprepare to move out!
And so, we set off north toward\nValkaheim, the City of Flame.
Who was the mysterious foe that attacked\nthe believers? And what exactly was\ngoing on in my brother's city?
Our first order of business was to find the\nForsaken Way and rescue any survivors.
After that, we'll meet my brother, Leonidas.
I can only imagine the hardships those\nsurvivors must be enduring.
We must make haste, Your Highness!
Agreed. If we don't find them quickly,\nthere may not be anyone left TO find.
Do we have any more information about\nwhoever drove them from the city?\nAre they still being pursued?
Apparently the villain is still driving\nbelievers out of the city in great numbers.
My brother Leonidas is the strongest\nof all my siblings; there's never been\na problem he couldn't handle.
So whoever this mystery foe is,\nwe need to take them very seriously.
I find it strange that this person seems to\nbe focusing their attacks on adherents of\nthe Church.
Yeah, the Church totally HELPS people!\nWhat kind of jerk has beef with that?
I don't know, Notte. I wish I did.
...It's nothing. Let's just find this person\nand put a stop to their nefarious scheme!
Well said! Hear hear! Love it! Wooooo!\nEr, and on that note, where are we going?
There's an old abandoned church\ndeep within this place.
I believe that's where the survivors\nare holed up.
Then why the heck are we standin' around\nhere flappin' our gums? Let's go already!
Subtle as always, Ranzal—but accurate.\nAll right, everyone. Let's find the survivors,\nthen go speak with my brother.
Uh, maybe you should look just a\nliiiiittle to your left there...
AAAAA HA HA HA! YEEEEEESSSS!\nIt's been so long since I've enjoyed\na good lava rain! Wooooooo!
One moment, my darling! Just let me\nfinish this steamy shower and I'll be\nRIGHT behind you!
Looks like she's gettin' juiced on\nfire mana, boss.
She'll catch up. Let's get moving.
Just waaaait, darling! You've got a\nsteaming hot plate of ME coming up!
Ack—Mym, you really ARE hot!\nYou're going to set my clothes on fire!
Well, she's as carefree as ever.
But the matter at hand is serious. \nHopefully she keeps it in check and\ndoesn't end up getting burned...
